para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: To prevent the operator doors from moving during shipping, the doors are locked in place by brackets.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Remove mounting screws [2] from each door.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-26px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:74px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: Remove each door lock brackets [1] after removing the screws.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This completes the removal of door lock brackets.
